CustomField.description: Allows an ASL related to a given SLI record to have a unique identifier per SLI quantity. So an SLI with a quantity of 3 would have 3 ASL records, and this field would be SLI.Id + 1,2,3 so forth eg: 01I3Z000001h12V0001,01I3Z000001h12V0002,01I3Z000001h12V0003, etc.
CustomField.label: ASL Unique Id
